org.alljoyn.services.common

Interface AnnouncementHandler


  • public interface AnnouncementHandler
    An interface to be implemented in order to receive Announcements

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAnnouncement(String serviceName, short port, BusObjectDescription[] objectDescriptions, Map<String,Variant> aboutData)
      Handle a received About Announcement
      void onDeviceLost(String serviceName)
      Handle a loss of connectivity with this bus name

    • Method Detail

      • onAnnouncement

        void onAnnouncement(String serviceName,
                  short port,
                  BusObjectDescription[] objectDescriptions,
                  Map<String,Variant> aboutData)
        Handle a received About Announcement
        Parameters:
        serviceName - the peer's AllJoyn bus name
        port - the peer's bound port for accepting About session connections
        objectDescriptions - the peer's BusInterfaces and BusObjects
        aboutData - a map of peer's properties.
        See Also:
        AboutKeys, AboutTransport.Announce(short, short, BusObjectDescription[], java.util.Map)

      • onDeviceLost

        void onDeviceLost(String serviceName)
        Handle a loss of connectivity with this bus name
        Parameters:
        serviceName -
